acceptAdmin(address).details: Only a pending admin for the account can become an admin

addPendingAdmin(address,address).details: Multiple admins can be set for an account

canCall(address,address,address,bytes4).details: Returns `true` if the admin OR the appointee is the caller

getAdmins(address).details: If the account has no admin, the account itself is returned

params.account: The account to get the admin of

getAppointees(address,address,bytes4).details: Does NOT include admin as an appointee, even though it can call

params.account: The account to get the pending admin of

isAdmin(address,address).details: If the account has no admin, the caller is checked to be the account itself

removeAdmin(address,address).details: Only the admin of the account can remove an adminReverts when an admin is removed such that no admins are remaining
